review: Your product is great !! Real simple to set up . Sling tv on the other hand took three days to start letting us use it .but now its working fine.
author: melvin

review: The best!  much better than my "smart TV"  Cable Gone!

review: I'm so happy with it, now I'm able to watch Netflix all day.

review: It has issues locking up or kicking you off while watching a show.

review: Great item...but important to know where it works....i.e. Germany, Austria and the US.

review: Easy to set up.  So far so good.

review: Very cool toy, but it needs software updates to make it right. It is faster but I do not like the menu format. There aren't as many movies available as I thought there would be. It is a great concept but should offer a little more for free.
author: Jayson Eidt

review: No interruption, easy to use, great on budget.
author: Amazon Customer
